channel.title: How do I change the server to make it public?
channel.description: How do I make my server public? I need to know so I can get my bro to test with me. If you have the answer and answer my question, Thanks.

item.title: How do I change the server to make it public?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Well actually I have had to port forward. And it’s pretty easy. Here are the steps:

  1. Start > Run
  2. Type: cmd
  3. Type: ipconfig
  4. Get your Default Gateway
  5. Open your browser and put the Default Gateway in the URL bar
    Note: For the next step you will need to know your router account and password. Default is account: admin ,pass: admin
  6. Type your account info in
  7. Find something that says port foward (Search the whole site if you have to)
  8. Then type the port you need to open. And what ever else you need to fill in.

Need more help? Pm me…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the server to make it public?

item.title: How do I change the server to make it public?
item.dc:creator: @puppy_boy puppy boy
item.description:
@puppy_boy wrote:

theres only 1 reply lol neway
you need to go to a no-ip site (dyndns.com?)
set up a no-ip and get the no-ip updater thing
you cant change your own ip to whatever you want
so you have to set up a no-ip anyway or just give your bro your normal ip
without a no-ip thing
but your normal ip might change so yeh set up a no-ip
